Reviews.Title: Smart and reliable
Reviews.Author: Jscott
Reviews.Content: Home burglary convinced the rest of the household to purchase surveillance set.  Easy to set up and configure.  My unit isn't connected directly to a monitor, but remote network access is simple and easy.  500GB with 8 cameras records about 1 week.  The motion grid for recording is easy to set up on each camera and can trigger any camera u select to start recording if you don't want it recording on a schedule or constantly.  Great product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Record over one month (1000 hours) of continuous video footage on the 500GB hard drivel; Fast and hassle-free setup - the coaching iMenu will guide you through the entire setup process
View video online with no service fees - view your DVR's live or recorded video footage anywhere in the world
iPhone, Blackberry, Windows Mobile and Symbian smartphone compatible - access live footage from your smart phone
Expandable to up to 8 surveillance cameras - your system can grow with you
24/7 lifetime Live Customer Service - our experts will get you online in no time; Built-in USB port allows for multiple easy backup options
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT CV301-8CH-X Web Ready 8 Channel H.264 500GB HDD DVR Security System with Smart Phone Access and Multiple Easy Backup Options
